item.description:
Join us in celebrating the 4th Edition launch with the event adventure Into the Shadowhaunt. Worldwide D&D Game Day comes the day after 4th Edition hits and will be the first adventure most of us with see, come try out your new books or just take the new rules for a test drive. Snacks and juice will be provided but bring your own food, there is a refrigerator available as well as plenty of seating! Lots of take out food in the area as well.

The best part is, it's totally free! The adventure is for groups of five, characters sheets and miniatures provided so if you want to help run a game then let us know as well!
item.name: Worldwide Dungeons & Dragons Game Day
